fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Name: Nguyen Ngoc Lam Anh 
Address: 208/116 Duong so 5, Binh Hung Hoa, Binh Tan 
Tel: 0975 087 878 - Email: lamanh_nguyen@yahoo.com 
Educational Qualifications 
• 2000 - 2005 : Bachelor of Engineering 
o Faculty of Information Technology, HCMC University of Technology 
Qualifications: 
• 14 years experience with Software Development, including 10 years as a team 
leader or Project Manager. 
• Experience with software development methodologies: 
§ Water falls 
§ Agile/Scrum 
• Experience with writing Functional Design, Detail Design 
• Experience with code smell and refactoring code 
• Knowledge about Design Patterns: Singleton, Factory, Façade, … 
• Knowledge with SaaS (Software as a Service) 
Projects: 
1. 2014 –now (Mulodo Vietnam company) 
§ Toriaina: 
Writing a Frontend site for assessment system 
OS: Ubuntu – Language: PHP - Database: postgresql 
Postion: Team Lead 
Team size: 3-4 members 
§ CORK: 
Writing EC system 
OS: Ubuntu - Language: PHP with Opencart - Database: Mysql 
Postion: Team Lead and PM 
Team size: 3 members 
§ Hamee: 
Writing unit test for Hamee system. 
OS: Centos - Language: PHP (Zend), PHPUnit - Database: Mysql 
Position: At the beginning, I worked as Project manager to start up a team with 3 
members. From 7/2016 I changed into team lead of team with a purpose to get trust 
by quality from client to extend team. 
Team size: 6 members 
§ ROM: 
Develop ROM system with fanclub management system, CMS system, automation 
seating chart... 
OS: Centos - Language: PHP (CI, Wordpress) - Database: Mysql 
Position: I was assigned to manage this team to solve many team issues (quality, 
under estimating, web security, communicating with client) from 10/2015 – 
7/2016 
Team size: 4 members 
§ Rakuten: 
Develop a part of Rakuten system with new technology 
Language: Java with Camel, Spring, Mule - Database: MongoDB 
Position: I was assigned to manage this team to re-structure team, work with client 
closely to solve conflict between team and client from 2/2016 - 7/2016 
Team size: 6 members 
§ HIS: 
Develop HIS system with flight ticket and hotel booking, rating system 
OS: Ubuntu - Language: PHP with FuelPHP - Database: Mysql 
Position: I was assigned to manage development team. I had worked with 
Japanese Project Manager to get requirement, support team,... since 4/2014 
Team size: 6 members 
2. 2009 –2014 (Harvey Nash Vietnam company)  
§ EasyCruit of Lumesse ODC: 
Maintain for an online recruitment web site of Europe client. 
OS: Ubuntu - Language: Perl, Mason. - Database: Mysql 
Position: I was a key member of development team in 2009 and 2010. From 2011 
I am working as Project manager of development team. 
Team size: 10 members 
§ Genus projects: 
Support build team for deployment, install CentOS, Mysql, PHP, Apache as 
versions of client. 
§ Bodog ODC: 
Develop new websites for Bodog client with Scrum. Support Dev Oops team for 
deployment, write shell script for build automatically. 
OS: CentOS - Language: PHP (LAMP) - Database: Mysql 
Position: Scrum Master and Technical Lead 
Team size: 6 members 
3. 3/2009 –10/2009 (TMA company) NTTS team: 
Worked as developer in NTTS to develop the website and internal soft phone tool 
for client (using Java programming). 
Sometimes supported Director in the client meeting as Japanese interpreter. 
4. 2006 –2009 (Nankai Co. Ltd, Japan) 
Set up web server for the project, develop for inserting a large excel data into 
database, manage, report … 
Config mail server, develop for getting and sending mail, making a tree with mails, 
parsing mail content 
OS: Linux - Language: Perl, Javascript - Database: Postgresql 8.3 
Position: Developer 
Employment History 
§ 4/2014 – now: Mulodo Vietnam 
Position: Development Project Manager and Team Leader 
§ 10/2009 – 4/2014: Havey Nash Vietnam 
Position: Developer (10/2009 – 2/2011) 
    And Team Lead and Project Manager (2/2011 – 4/2014) 
§ 3/2009 – 10/2009: TMA Company 
Position: Developer 
§ 02/2006-01/2009: Nankai Company Co. Ltd 
Position: Developer 
§ 07/2005-12/2005: Tri Nhan Co. Ltd 
Position: Developer 
Foreign languages skills 
§ English: Level B2 (2011) of Bulats speaking test and level B1 high (2010) of 
Bulats reading and writing test. 
§ Japanese: N2 (2008). 
Computer Skills 
Languages: Salesforce, Perl/CGI, Perl/Mason, PHP, Java, Delphi, Javascript 
Devops tool: Vagrant, Chef, Docker, Ansible 
Operating systems: FreeBSD, Ubuntu, Centos, Redhat 
Others: Apache, FTP, SMTP, NFS… 
Database: Postgresql, MySQL 
Basic knowledge : networking protocol 
Other tools: VMWare, SVN, Git, Bitbucket, Perforce, Devtrack, Microsoft Project, 
Jira, Bamboo, Redmine, CI system (CircleCI, Jenskin)… 
Achievement : 
Team of the Year 2017 for Hamee team 
Team lead of the year 2011 of Lumesse ODC. 
Certificate of “Leadership skills” of G&H Managerment Services. 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
